prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A black ribbed crop top featuring a classic round neckline and wide shoulder straps. Centered on the chest is a bold graphic of a red broken heart, intricately outlined and filled, with white cursive text overlaid that reads "No Love, Only Styles." The garment is made from a ribbed knit fabric, and a small white brand tag is visible vertically on the bottom right hem.
key_visual_features: White script text "No Love, Only Styles"
Small white brand tag with "STUDIO OTTIES" text
prompt_boosters: Close-up of heart and text graphic
Highlight contrast of red and white on black
